dialog: Do ye carry any fresh produce, live flora, or fauna with ye?
Nay, none at all.
Thank ye kindly. Ye may lock yer suitcase. Here be yer wizarding identification papers.
Many thanks.
Greetings. I purchased a garment from China at yer emporium this morn.
Aye?
I've acquired it in an overlarge size by accident.
Oh, did ye now?
Might ye be able to alter it to a size smaller?
Indeed, of course. Might ye bring the receipt with ye?
I'll visit yer establishment later this eve, and may I inquire about yer closing time?
Our shop shall remain open until 8 bells in the evening, madam. We eagerly anticipate yer arrival.
The headmaster announces the increase in wages today, aye? What is yer estimation of the amount we shall receive?
I've no notion. Yer guess is as good as mine.
It had best be more than last year.
Indeed, anything is better than naught. Let us wait and see.
I plan to venture forth and gather provisions for sustenance.
Pray, do we require provisions?
I believe we have run out of provisions to sustain us.
Do ye have a list of items to procure?
